content.question: The creation of libraries in the late 1800s as described in the excerpt best reflects which of the following developments?

choices.label: Attempts to provide opportunities for people to fill their leisure time
Challenges to the system of settlement houses in major cities
Efforts to provide formerly enslaved people with education
Undertakings to assimilate Native Americans into United States culture

content.answer: Attempts to provide opportunities for people to fill their leisure time

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
